Package com.g1.mychess.admin.service.impl

Class AdminServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.admin.service.impl.AdminServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminService
@Service public class AdminServiceImpl extends Object implements AdminService
Implementation of the AdminService interface, providing administrative operations such as blacklisting and whitelisting players, and managing blacklist expiration.

    • autoWhitelistExpiredBans

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=3600000L) public void autoWhitelistExpiredBans()
      Automatically whitelists players whose bans have expired. This method is scheduled to run periodically.
      Specified by:
      autoWhitelistExpiredBans in interface AdminService
